short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official Helper.World extension has been built to join incoming support session in your browser directly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper.World platform is the Uber of modern call centers. The offical Google Chrome extension for Helper.World has been built to join incomming suport session in your browser directly. It matches between frustrated clients and one of the helpers: members of your support team OR most relevant qualified users. The helper assists the user, in real-time, within your website or application.
